javalabra.chess.core.impl
Interface GameState

All Known Implementing Classes:
AbstractGameState, SelectMoveState, SelectPieceState
public interface GameState

State interface representing game's current state.

Author:
Nikita Frolov

Method Summary
 GameState handle(int column, int row, MoveDirector director, GameContext context, GameEventEmitter em)
          Handles square selection.
 

Method Detail

handle

GameState handle(int column,
                 int row,
                 MoveDirector director,
                 GameContext context,
                 GameEventEmitter em)
Handles square selection. Returns next state object.

Parameters:
column - column index that was selected
row - row index that was selected
director - move director
context - game context
em - game's event emitter
Returns:
state object to be set next
